languages.text: "Полагаю, дело не в размерах территории, а в компетентности губернатора. Он даже не прислал за нами подобающий кортеж!"

traits.locale_text: "Полагаю, дело не в размерах территории, а в компетентности губернатора. Он даже не прислал за нами подобающий кортеж!"

languages.text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, дело не в размерах территории, а в компетентности губернатора. Он даже не прислал за нами подобающий кортеж!"

traits.locale_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: «En mi opinión, no se trata del tamaño del territorio, sino de la competencia del gobernador. ¡Ni siquiera nos ha enviado una comitiva digna para recibirnos!».
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: 「重要なのは領土の広さではなく、総督の能力であると、あたくしは主張するわ。あたくしたちを出迎えるためのまともな従者すら送らなかったのよ！」
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: “我个人认为，关键并不在于领土大小，而在于总督本人的能力。他甚至都没有派遣正式的随行队伍来接待我们！”
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: "Ich würde anführen, dass nicht die Größe des Gebietes, sondern die Kompetenz des Gouverneurs entscheidend ist. Er hat nicht einmal ein ordentliches Begrüßungskomitee geschickt!"
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: « Je dirais que ce n'est pas la taille du territoire qui compte, mais plutôt la compétence de son gouverneur. Il n'a même pas envoyé de cortège digne de ce nom pour nous accueillir ! »
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
"I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"

languages.text: "Burada mühim olanın toprağın boyutu değil, valinin kabiliyeti olduğu düşüncesindeyim. Bizi karşılamaya uygun bir kortej bile göndermemiş!"
languages.original_text: "I would argue that it is not the size of the territory, but the competence of the governor that matters. He did not even send a proper cortege to meet us!"
